pages.text: 15|71|keat ban pol tha  ke teangnih  kuchea kaunosrei robsa yeung ( chaur riebkear nung puok neang choh)  brasenbae puok anak chng thveu dauchnaoh .
15|72|( a l laoh mean bantoul tha)  yeung sbath nung chivit robsa anak ( mou ham meat)  pitabrakd nasa  puokke ku sthetnow knong pheap v nge  v ngr bsa  puokke daoy puokke mindoeng avei laey .
15|73|dau che  neah  samrek yeang khlang ban chhk yk chivit puokke now  velea thngaireah .
15|74|dau che  neah yeung ban thveu aoy phoumisrok noh( phoumi sa daum now  balestein) kraleab pi leu chohkraom  haey yeung ban banhchouh phlieng  thm pi dei dot towleu puokke .
15|75|pitabrakd nasa  champoh rueng teangnoh kuchea phosdo tang  samreab banda anak del meul daoy pichearna .
15|76|haey pitabrakd nasa vea( tikrong sa daum) noh ku sthetnow  cham phlauv thom( del anakdamnaer meulkheunh vea)  .
15|77|pitabrakd nasa  nowknong rueng teangnoh  kuchea phosdo tang  muoy samreab banda anak del mean chomnue .
15|78|haey pitabrakd nasa  puok del rsanow knong prei( brachachn sahou eb) kuchea puok del bampean .

15|79|haey yeung kaban phdantatosa champoh puokke( brachachn robsa sahou eb) .  haey pitabrakd nasa  kanleng teangpir( kanleng robsa  brachachn lout  ning sahou eb)noh  ku sthetnow tamophlauv thom muoy da chbasa  leasa .
15|80|haey chea karpit nasa  puok( sa mou d) del rsanow daoy  chaoh phnom thveuchea phteah ban bdeseth champoh banda anakneasar .
15|81|haey yeung ban phdal phosdo tang robsa yeung cheachraen dl puok ke  kabonde puokke bercha ban ngeak chenhpi vea towvinh .
15|82|haey puokke ban chaoh phnom thveuchea lomnow dthan daoy sovotthephap .
15|83|haey samrek da khlang ban chhk yk chivit puokke now velea  tiebaphlu .
15|84|haey avei del puokke ban thveu kanlongomk min ach karpar  puokke( pi tearounakamm) ban laey .

15|85|haey yeung minban bangkeut mekh cheachraen chean  ning phendei  haeyning avei  del nowchanloh vea teangpir noh laey leuklengte  mean moulheto troemotrauv bonnaoh .  haey pitabrakd nasa thngai  barlok nung chhean mokadl cheaminkhan .  hetonih chaur anak( mou ham meat) anoukroh( dl puok mou sh ri ki n) nouv kar anoukroh muoy  da laobrapei .
15|86|pitabrakd nasa  mcheasa robsa anak  trong kuchea anakabangkeut  mha doeng .
15|87|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban phdal aoy anak( mou ham meat)  brapir khlea nei a l mea sa ni( sau raoh a l ha  v tei hah) ruom cheamuoynung  kompir kuor an da utdongk utdam .

15|88|haey anak( mou ham meat) kom samlung phnek teangpir robsa anak  meul towkean avei( tropy sa mb tde  bony sakde) del yeung ban phdal  aoy krom muoychamnuon knongchamnaom puokke( puok kmean chomnue)  haey chaur anak  kom pibeak chetd champoh puokke aoy saoh .  haey chaur anak lomtonkay robsa  anak champoh banda anak del mean chomnue choh .
15|89|haey chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha  pitabrakd nasa khnhom  chea anak dasatuen promean yeang chbasaleasa .
15|90|kadauchchea yeung ban banhchouh( tearounakamm) towleu puok del beng  chek( puok areab kmean chomnue  puok yeahou ti  ning na sa r ni) phng der .
